confirm_out_game: You haven't finished the game yet, if you exit now your progress won't be saved.
completed_word_set: You have completed the word set
creator: Creator
how_to_play_1: • Choose a question set by your favorite topic
how_to_play_2: • Words will be scrambled randomly (apple : p/a/l/p/e)
how_to_play_3: • Type the correct word to move to the next one
how_to_play_4: • Each word you will have 1 chance to use hints if available
how_to_play_5: • Complete all words in the set to finish
scoring_1: • Ranking will be calculated based on total score and completion time.
scoring_2: • Each set has its own leaderboard
scoring_3: • You can replay to improve your time
scoring_4: • You will earn XP when finishing a puzzle
